title: Trip Optimizer Enabled
description: Enable or disable the trip optimizer.

title: Trip Optimizer Time
description: Daily time to run the optimizer.

title: Trip Finalizer Enabled
description: Enable or disable the trip finalizer.

title: Trip Finalizer Lead Hours
description: Number of hours before departure when a trip becomes eligible to finalize.

title: Trip Finalizer Time
description: Daily time to evaluate and finalize trips based on lead hours.

title: Trip Reminder Enabled
description: Enable or disable passenger reminders for next-day trips.

title: Trip Reminder Time
description: Specific time on the day before the trip to send reminders.

title: Activity Log Enabled
description: Enable or disable activity logging across services.

title: Support Contact Name
description: Display name shown to users for support contact.

title: Support Contact Phone Number
description: Phone number shown to users for support contact.
